name: Fabius
headline: AI to improve Sales Calls
description:
Fabius helps sales leaders understand and improve their reps' performance by analyzing customer calls with AI. Companies like Airbyte and Fermat use us to score every call and identify when a customer hasn’t been properly qualified.

Fabius helps drive decisions within sales, including:
- Disqualify a deal: Reps work on deals that will never close. We identify the deals that won't be successful and make sure reps don't waste time on them.
- Need to strengthen the business case for a deal: We tell managers and reps when a deal has a weak business case and show them how to uncover more business value in the deal.
tags: industry:generative-ai; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:sales; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Neil Madsen, Founder
founders.description:
Neil is the CEO of Fabius.  

Before co-founding Fabius, Neil was the Head of Technical Services at LiveRamp, where he led all technical customer-facing teams (Sales Engineering, Implementation, Technical Account Management, and Support). 

He has a BS in Computer Science from The Ohio State University.

founders.name: Andy Day, Co-Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CTO of Fabius. Previously lead the Pixel Serving Engineering Team @ LiveRamp.

# Fabius is an Expert in Your Go-to-Market Motion
# Fabius is an Expert in Your Go-to-Market Motion
## Fabius is an Expert in Your Go-to-Market Motion
# Fabius is an Expert in Your Go-to-Market Motion
Fabius is the intelligence layer for your go-to-market motion. Our platform becomes an expert in the unique details of what you do, and applies that knowledge across sales/post-sales - including calls, customer documents, public information, emails, and more.

SMART

## Fabius Knows Your Business as Well as You Do
#### Fabius Knows Your Business as Well as You Do
Fabius ingests your sales data - calls, emails, decks, blogs, product marketing materials, training materials, you name it. But we don't just stop at generic "AI insights". Our platform zooms in on the specific talk tracks, proof points, and buying signals that seal deals for your unique product and market.
Fabius focuses on the things that matter to your sales org, whether that's:
Uncovering how your top reps handle the "Salesforce vs HubSpot" question from prospects
Uncovering how your top reps handle the "Salesforce vs HubSpot" question from prospects
Understanding the pre-call research that reps are expected to do before a discovery call
Understanding the pre-call research that reps are expected to do before a discovery call
Knowing the compliance and security points that IT buyers need to hear
Knowing the compliance and security points that IT buyers need to hear
Identifying the ROI data that makes your CFO prospects' eyes light up
Identifying the ROI data that makes your CFO prospects' eyes light up
Put simply, Fabius becomes fluent in your sales motion and product, so it can automate parts of your sales process and direct your reps to focus on the behaviors that matter for you.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Xj1lvb0nEtedK23M5BdFGXtV7U.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Xj1lvb0nEtedK23M5BdFGXtV7U.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Xj1lvb0nEtedK23M5BdFGXtV7U.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/CbCmM67sYZPRKdfvfG6t2QGRaiU.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/CbCmM67sYZPRKdfvfG6t2QGRaiU.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/CbCmM67sYZPRKdfvfG6t2QGRaiU.png)
FEATURE
## Fabius Empowers Your Team to Win
Armed with a PhD in your sales process, Fabius serves up hyper-relevant intelligence at every stage of your customer interactions.
##### Pre-Call Research
Fabius analyzes a prospect’s website (including sub-pages like blogs, case studies, technical documentation, and more) and tells your rep how to start discovery. Less “tell me about what you do” and more “I see you recently launched a new service that helps first-time home buyers, tell me more about how adoption for that is going…”
Fabius analyzes a prospect’s website (including sub-pages like blogs, case studies, technical documentation, and more) and tells your rep how to start discovery. Less “tell me about what you do” and more “I see you recently launched a new service that helps first-time home buyers, tell me more about how adoption for that is going…”
##### Post-Call Automation
Fabius automatically generates insightful, personalized emails after customer calls complete with tailored email structure and including the most relevant case studies, ROI proof points, or technical docs. We also keep your CRM up-to-date automatically.
Fabius automatically generates insightful, personalized emails after customer calls complete with tailored email structure and including the most relevant case studies, ROI proof points, or technical docs. We also keep your CRM up-to-date automatically.
##### Feedback and Coaching
Fabius works with you to generate specific rubrics for areas like Discovery, Selling, and other behaviors. Reps are scored using these unique rubrics and are provided specific directions on what they could do better.
Fabius works with you to generate specific rubrics for areas like Discovery, Selling, and other behaviors. Reps are scored using these unique rubrics and are provided specific directions on what they could do better.
## See Fabius In Action
Curious how Fabius can move the needle on your unique sales KPIs? Let us create a custom demo, filled with insights from your team's actual calls and emails. No generic pitches - just a tailored analysis of how Fabius can become your reps' best sidekick.
[Request a demo](https://fabius.io/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/neil324>)

generated_description:
**Fabius: Empowering Sales with AI-Driven Insights**

Founded in 2020, Fabius is a San Francisco-based startup that aims to revolutionize sales calls through its AI-driven platform. Part of Y Combinator's W23 cohort, Fabius is on a mission to help sales leaders improve their representatives' performance by analyzing customer interactions intelligently.

**What Does Fabius Do?**

Fabius offers a sophisticated tool that dissects sales calls, focusing on two critical areas:

1. **Disqualification of Deals:** Reps often chase deals that have little chance of closing. Fabius identifies these opportunities, helping sales teams prioritize their efforts on leads that are likely to convert.
   
2. **Strengthening Business Cases:** The platform points out when a deal may lack a solid business rationale. It also provides actionable insights on how to extract more value from the deal, guiding reps to articulate stronger business cases.

**How It Works:**

Fabius becomes the intelligence layer for a company’s go-to-market strategy. It ingests various sales-related data—calls, emails, proposals, and more—to offer tailored insights that are hyper-relevant to each sales organization. By mastering the intricacies of your product and market, Fabius automates facets of the sales process and steers reps towards the actions that matter most.

**Key Features:**

- **Pre-Call Research:** It analyzes prospects’ information and prepares your reps with meaningful insights to customize their approach, ensuring they ask the right questions from the start.
  
- **Post-Call Automation:** After a call, Fabius generates personalized follow-up emails, enriching them with relevant case studies or ROI data, and updates CRM systems automatically.

- **Feedback & Coaching:** It develops specific scoring rubrics to evaluate reps on essential behaviors during sales processes, ultimately enhancing performance through constructive feedback.

**Why Choose Fabius?**

Fabius positions itself not just as another AI tool, but as a strategic partner in navigating the complex landscape of sales. Companies like Airbyte and Fermat have leveraged its capabilities to streamline their sales processes and up their success rates. As a compact team of two, Fabius underscores the potential of targeted technology solutions in the ever-competitive B2B landscape.

If you’re a sales leader looking to become more data-driven and efficient, Fabius might just be the sidekick your team needs to boost performance and drive results. 

Explore more at [Fabius.io](https://fabius.io) and see how their technology can turn your sales strategy into a winning formula.
